long_description: Keep your ears warm without overheating while you're running, biking and hiking in cool weather with the REI Airflyte headband. Stretchy polyester/spandex fabric breathes well and wicks sweat off skin. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Wider than most headbands, the REI Airflyte provides great coverage; headband is 3.5 in. wide in front and 5 in. wide in back. Reflective hits front and back increase visibility in low light.
short_description: Keep your ears warm without overheating while you're running, biking and hiking in cool weather with the REI Airflyte headband.
